mapper.select: SELECT * FROM projects WHERE parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY order_number;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projects (parent_id, image_id, url, name_jp, name_en, name_ru, name_romaji, author, illustrator, order_number, banner_hidden, project_hidden, onevolume, franchise, annotation, title) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{imageId}, #{url}, #{nameJp}, #{nameEn}, #{nameRu}, #{nameRomaji}, #{author}, #{illustrator}, #{orderNumber}, #{bannerHidden}, #{projectHidden}, #{onevolume}, #{franchise}, #{annotation}, #{title})
mapper.update: UPDATE projects SET parent_id = #{parentId}, image_id = #{imageId}, url = #{url}, title = #{title}, name_jp = #{nameJp}, name_en = #{nameEn}, name_ru = #{nameRu}, name_romaji = #{nameRomaji}, author = #{author}, illustrator = #{illustrator}, order_number = #{orderNumber}, banner_hidden = #{bannerHidden}, project_hidden = #{projectHidden}, onevolume = #{onevolume}, franchise = #{franchise}, annotation = #{annotation} WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
